actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Commerce to convey certain Federal property in Montgomery County, Maryland, to the city of Gaithersburg, Maryland.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce to convey specified land at the site of former Department of Defense Nike Battery W-92 in Montgomery County, Maryland, transferred to the Department of Commerce in 1976 for use by the National Institute of Standards and Technology to the City of Gaithersburg for use as a public park.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Commerce to convey certain Federal property in Montgomery County, Maryland, to the city of Gaithersburg, Maryland.
